title: Mo'Nique Interview
itunes:title: Mo'Nique Interview
description:
Monique stops by The Breakfast Club to discuss why she chose to expose the emails sent to her by the "Empire" crew offering her the role of Cookie. She expressed that she was never blackballed, why she stays on the road doing comedy, her big weight loss and much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
